meanings.definition: Geodesists: People who study the size and shape of the Earth.
meanings.sent1: The geodesists measured the Earth's dimensions with precision.
meanings.sent2: Many geodesists use advanced technology to analyze the Earth's structure.
meanings.sent3: The geodesists had a 'round' discussion about the Earth's circumference.
meanings.sent4: In their work, geodesists unravel the Earth's mysteries layer by layer.
meanings.sent5: The geodesists' dedication to understanding the Earth is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: Geodesists: The study of the size and shape of the Earth.
meanings.sent1: Studying geodesists helps us comprehend the Earth's form better.
meanings.sent2: The geodesists' research contributes valuable insights into Earth's structure.
meanings.sent3: During the conference, the geodesists shared fascinating facts about the Earth's shape.
meanings.sent4: The geodesists' work sheds light on the Earth's intricate dimensions.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the findings of geodesists can be truly eye-opening.
